Subject: REMINDER | Driving Innovation - In-person Behavioural Workshop | May 29 
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Colleagues,

 

We trust you are all well!

 

This is a final email reminder that you are invited to attend the Driving Innovation - In-person Behavioural Workshop on May 29th, which is held face-to-face.

 

If you haven‚Äôt confirmed your attendance yet, kindly respond to the invitation below to secure your spot.

 

To make things super smooth, remember to have access to Chalhoub University for the self-check-in process. Just scan the QR Code at the reception or when the facilitator prompts during the session.

If you haven‚Äôt confirmed your attendance yet, kindly respond to the invitation below to secure your spot.

 

To make things super smooth, remember to have access to Chalhoub University for the self-check-in process. Just scan the QR Code at the reception or when the facilitator prompts during the session. 

 

Pro tip: Come prepared with your Chalhoub Login Details to skip the registration queue!

 

We look forward to an engaging and insightful workshop with you. See you soon! üòä

 

With you at heart,



www.chalhoubuniversity.com <http://www.chalhoubuniversity.com/> 

 

 

 

 

________________________________

 

 



 

In-person Behavioural Workshops

Date

Thursday | May 29, 2025

Time

9:00 A.M. ‚Äì 12:30 P.M.

Venue 

Gifts Room | Retail Academy, D3, building 11, 1st floor 

Facilitator

Razan Badri

Confirmation

Please send your confirmation by May 23rd to: Francesca Ortaliz <mailto:francesca.ortaliz@chalhoub.com> 



 

 

Chalhoub University is delighted to invite you to the in-person behavioural workshop on Driving Innovation. Driving Innovation is about seeking out and implementing new ideas, methods, or solutions to improve processes, products, or services. It involves being curious, open to change, willing to take calculated risks, and encouraging others to think creatively.

 

Objectives:

As an attendee, you will:

*	Learn how to build a culture of innovation in your team and organisation. 
*	Demonstrate the key practices to nurturing innovation in your organisation. 

What you need to do before you come to the session?

chunks.text:
*	Learn how to build a culture of innovation in your team and organisation. 
*	Demonstrate the key practices to nurturing innovation in your organisation. 

What you need to do before you come to the session?

*	Read all the articles and write notes
*	Watch all the videos and write notes
*	Come prepared with your notes

You can find the articles and videos at this link: Driving Innovation Behavioural Course <https://chalhoubuniversity.com/course/view.php?id=3483> 

Through interactive exercises and meaningful conversations, you will walk away with practical insights, stronger alignment, and a renewed commitment to working together effectively

 



 

Registration & Confirmation

 

üì© To confirm your attendance, please ACCEPT the Outlook invitation. We encourage you to discuss the programme with your direct manager and align on expected outcomes both for you and your team, prior to confirming your attendance.
üïí Registration on the day will begin promptly at 8:30 AM, so we kindly request that you arrive on time.

 

Cancellation Policy

 

‚ùå If you are unable to attend, please DECLINE the Outlook invitation or email our learning coordinator, Francesca Ortaliz, no later than 24 hours before the event. This will help avoid being marked as a no-show.

 

Thank you for your cooperation in helping us uphold a respectful and presentable workplace environment.

 

 

	
		 
 


With you at heart,

Chalhoub University Team

 



www.chalhoubuniversity.com <http://www.chalhoubuniversity.com> 

 

 

 

CHALHOUB UNIVERSITY
